appetizers.abalone_chawan_mushi: savory egg custard with abalone and California caviar

appetizers.eggplant_and_sunchoke_tart: puree of grilled eggplant and sunchoke on phyllo dough

cold_sandwiches.jambon_manchego_brioche: Spanish jambon with aged Manchego on homemade brioche

cold_sandwiches.lox_with_onion_jelly: lox and onion jelly served on baguette

cold_sandwiches.white_bean_and_avocado_toast: sliced Haas avocados and white bean puree on toasted black bread

hot_sandwiches.culatello_ham_and_cheese: aged Culatello ham with aged Fontina and Grana Padano on ciabatta

hot_sandwiches.grilled_sardine_baguette: grilled Mediterranean sardines with caper butter on baguette

hot_sandwiches.red_pepper_on_seed_bun: grilled red peppers with basil foam and microgreens on seed bun

desserts.cherry_tartlet: Door County cherries with almond custard in puff pastry

desserts.mille_feuilles: layers of dark chocolate with apricots, hazlenut, and crispy dough

desserts.flourless_vegan_chocolate_cake: chocolate ganache atop rich chocolate cake with coconut creme

drinks.citrus_cooler: cara cara orange and finger lime juice with rye and muddled yuzu

drinks.virgils_soda: root beer, cola, creme soda, or orange soda

drinks.strawberry_and_watermelon_juice: freshly juiced strawberries with a hint of watermelon juice
